name: Siphonophore
description:
Linked with a Pan-Dimensional Monster, You fight to survive and find your way home…!

FEATURES:



  • Blast your way through Mind Altering Areas of the Hyades Star Cluster as you journey across the Galaxy.

  • Defend your Symbiotically Bonded Monster from Hordes of Soul Devouring Demiurge spawn and various Tentacled Abominations.

  • Solve 'Colour & Geomancy' Puzzles to Complete Mystical Summoning Rites and bring forth minions of the Archons.

  • Fight your way through Six Unique End Level Bosses.

  • Contemplate the vast mysteries of our Universe via an esoteric plot which combines elements of Lovecraftian Cosmicism, Theosophy and Ancient Gnosticism.

  • All while enjoying the soothing sounds of an Original Dream-Piano Soundtrack.

...Stars Now Are Right…!
